name: Amy Levy PR
tagline: Life is too short to remain unnoticed.
description: Since its founding in 2002, Amy Levy Public Relations, Inc. has represented an impressive roster of clients ranging from gluten-free and natural products to restaurants, housewares designers, arts organizations and wellness professionals. Amy Levy PR is public relations and more. It is a personal involvement and 24/7 dedication that no other PR firm can equal. We offer a range of services that will help to raise your bottom line. We deliver well beyond your expectations.
